title: The Rena King Show
description: Rena King discusses difficult and important topics with guests and subject matter experts.
quote: Do you think erotic and violent TV shows lead to desensitisation? To dehumanisation?
alt1: two guests: Max Renn (a man in a suit) and Nicki Brand (a blonde woman in a red dress)
alt2: Rena King speaks with Professor Brian O’Blivion who is on a television screen
